author: MilanoBicocca-pix
body:
As requested by PPD group, we provide a new set of smearing parameters that include:
- beta star, emittance and sigma Z as the nominal foreseen conditions
- luminous region X, Y and Z as measured offline for the runs in LHC fills 3857 and 3858

for reference
https://indico.cern.ch/event/368346/contribution/2/2/material/slides/0.pdf
title: Add vtx smearing parameters: nominal beam parameters, realistic centroid
